       Megatron placed the disk on the pedastal and then waited for the show 
to begin. Rampage and Marine stayed back, and watched in amazement.

       The three Energonian Crafts bhurst into the crossfire. They suddenly 
blazed blue as there smal lshields engulfed the vessles. Then ,they split up 
to go to thier tasks.
       "We have more vessles coming from planetside, sir. Maximal and 
Predacon. I guess this is really, really important." Putnam said, taking his 
seat at the weapons station.
       Ominous grimaced, "Well, I doubt we'd have much success in destroying 
the Ark. All I want is to capture the Autobots and put them under our 
control."
       "Mabey we should help out some of the Predacons, it would be faster 
than trying to take the Ark ourselfs." Akron said over the speaker.
       He nodded. It seemed stratigically sound at this point. "Open a 
channle to Killfest. ...Killfest? This is Commander Ominous Prime of the 
Energon forces. I am willing to aid you if you allow us some control over 
what will become of the Autobots, or the Ark. Our energon based weapons are 
excellent, and after enough bombarding we can slice right through those 
shields. Do you agree to the terms?"



--part1_84.1126566c.27b45dec_boundary
